Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that San Juan mayor Carmen Yulín Cruz was not arrested for misusing federal disaster relief funds.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on false reports and rumors spread on social media.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes a problematic assumption that the "Puerto Rico mayor" mentioned in the false reports is Yulín Cruz, even though it was a different mayor who was indicted.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the claim, which is that a different Puerto Rican mayor, Miguel G. Ortiz-Vélez, was the one who was indicted for misappropriating disaster relief funds.
